cyberware.notes: COOL +1 (max 11); user is a top British agent

cyberware.name: Sunny Day
cyberware.notes: Feel happy; +4 vs Intimidation; +2 Resist Torture

cyberware.name: Xarghis Khan
cyberware.notes: EMP 1; COOL 10; user wants to torture and kill

cyberware.name: Basic Processor
cyberware.notes: Basic processor. Needed for all Neuralware

cyberware.name: Sensory Boost (smell/audio)
cyberware.notes: Boosted signal from either olfactory or hearing

cyberware.name: Chipslot
cyberware.notes: Animal can use as many chips as their INT

cyberware.name: Berserk Chip
cyberware.notes: To hit +2; negates COOL rolls; +2 melee damage

cyberware.name: Basic Eye
cyberware.notes: Basiceye module (3 option spaces per eye)

cyberware.name: Infrared
cyberware.notes: See in total darkness; using heat emissions

cyberware.name: Low-lite
cyberware.notes: See in dim light; almost total darkness

cyberware.name: Scrambler
cyberware.notes: Cannot understand with out a descrambler

cyberware.name: Secret Compartment
cyberware.notes: 2 in. x 2 in. x 4 in. hidden compartment

cyberware.name: Added Cyberlimb Strength
cyberware.notes: +1d6 damage; +6 Strength Feat if on all limbs

cyberware.name: Popup Gun
cyberware.notes: Gun size based on Body Type

cyberware.name: Cyberweapon
cyberware.notes: As cyber weapon; but half hc

cyberware.name: External Weapon Harness
cyberware.notes: BODY 2 min; size limit as Pop-Up Weapons

cyberware.name: Flasher
cyberware.notes: EX +0 - C 20+ REF; blind 1 min 1 1 ST 2m

cyberware.name: KatNip - Feline
cyberware.notes: Slit-eyes; pointed ears; tail; synthskin; scratchers

cyberware.name: Rodent
cyberware.notes: Enlarged ears and eyes; button nose; synthskin

cyberware.name: Rabbit
cyberware.notes: Bunny ears\& tail; button nose; whiskers

cyberware.name: Reptile
cyberware.notes: No ears; long tongue; olfactory; fangs; synthskin

cyberware.name: Elf
cyberware.notes: Pointed ears; thin face; upturned eyebrows

cyberware.name: Ork/Goblin
cyberware.notes: Broad features; longer arms; fangs; synthskin

cyberware.name: Troll/Ogre
cyberware.notes: Broad features; fangs; taller; grafted muscle; MBL

cyberware.name: BearPackage
cyberware.notes: Muzzle; fangs; claws; fur; taller; grafted muscle

cyberware.name: TheSuperman
cyberware.notes: The future of humanity via nano and bioware

cyberware.name: Big Katt
cyberware.notes: Muzzle; fangs; claws; tail; digitigrade legs; fur

cyberware.name: Slight Buggy
cyberware.notes: Bug-eyes; antennae; scaly synthskin; cyber optics

cyberware.name: Franz Kafka Bughouse
cyberware.notes: as Slight Buggy; + mandibles; exoskeleton; scratchers

cyberware.name: Merman
cyberware.notes: Gills; skinchange; fishtail; cust. contacts; sonar

cyberware.name: Sharkman
cyberware.notes: Gills; sonar; skinweave\& change; muzzle; etc

cyberware.name: LupaForm Minor Package
cyberware.notes: Pointed ears; dog-nose\& eyes; fangs; synthskin

cyberware.name: LupaForm Major Package
cyberware.notes: as minor form; + muzzle; tail; digitgrade legs; fur

cyberware.name: Playbeing Addition
cyberware.notes: Adds Increased ATT; tactile boost; behavior chip; etc
